casebody.data:
STATE
v.
CLYDE 2019-0318 Supreme Court of Ohio. August 21, 2019

CASE ANNOUNCEMENT

MOTION AND PROCEDURAL RULING

On appellant's request for records. Request denied.

Donnelly, J., concurs and clarifies for appellant that there is no opinion to provide given that the members of this court generally do not release opinions explaining their votes to deny or accept an appeal.
